Re: Epstein, Jeffrey, Register No. 76318-054
From: Ray Ormond
To: Sonya Thompson
Date: 2019/07/23 13:57
Subject: Re: Epstein, Jeffrey, Register No. 76318-054
Attachments: TEXT.htm
(b)(7)(A), (b)(7)(B)
Sent from my Verizon, Samsung Galaxy smartphone

----- Original message -----
From: Sonya Thompson (b)(6) @bop.gov>
Date: 7/23/19 1:55 PM (GMT-05:00)
To: Ray Ormond (b)(6) @bop.gov>
Subject: Re: Epstein, Jeffrey, Register No. 76318-054

>>> "Sonya Thompson" 07/23/2019 13:55 >>>
(b)(7)(A) (b)(7)(B)
From: Ray Ormond (b)(6) @bop.gov>
To: (b)(6) @bop.gov
CC: (b)(6) @bop.gov, (b)(6) @bop.gov, (b)(6) @bop.gov
Date: 7/23/2019 1:52 PM
Subject: Epstein, Jeffrey, Register No. 76318-054
Sonya - See below for possible media attention. (b)(7)(A), (b)(7)(B)
Sent from my Verizon, Samsung Galaxy smartphone

----- Original message -----
From: "Shirley V. Skipper-Scott" (b)(6) @bop.gov>
Date: 7/23/19 1:41 PM (GMT-05:00)
To: Ray Ormond (b)(6) @bop.gov>
Subject: Re: Fwd: Epstein

>>> "Shirley V. Skipper-Scott" 07/23/2019 13:41 >>>
If you need additional information, please let me know. Thanks
(b)(7)(E)

Shirley Skipper-Scott
Associate Warden
MCC New York
150 Park Row
New York, New York 10007
Office: 646-836(b)(6)
Black Berry: 646-423(b)(6)
(b)(6) @bop.gov
